DOC.brief_summary: This single-dose , fast non-fasting , open-label , randomize , three-regimen , parallel group study 42 subject
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Effect Food DSM265 Granules Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , open label , single dose , parallel group study consist 3 group 14 subject . Subjects confine 3 day follow outpatient assessment Day 21 . Blood sample assessment DSM265 plasma concentration collect 480 hour dose . This study compare relative bioavailability oral DSM265 50 % spray dry dispersion ( SDD ) granules reference 25 % SDD powder suspension formulation , evaluate effect food DSM265 50 % SDD granule
DOC.criteria: Female subject nonchild bear potential : surgically sterile ( hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy and/or bilateral salpingectomy bilateral tubal ligation ) OR postmenopausal ( without use hormonal contraceptive spontaneous amenorrhea 12 month follicle stimulate hormone > 40 IU/mL age appropriate menopause medical explanation amenorrhea ) Males : If ( include vasectomy ) sexually active female partner ( ) childbearing potential , must agree , Day 1 120 day dose study drug practice continuous acceptable method contraception partner ( ) . If female partner postmenopausal permanently sterile , male subject must agree use condom Day 1 120 day dose study drug Females must negative pregnancy test : Screening within 28 day prior initial study drug administration , prior dose Study Day 1 Body Mass Index least 18.0 less / equal 29.9 . Body weight must > 50 kg General good health , base medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory profile Electrocardiogram Voluntarily sign date inform consent , approve Institutional Review Board , prior screen study procedure Female pregnant , breastfeed consider become pregnant study approximately 60 day dose study drug Male consider father child donate sperm study 120 day last dose study drug History significant sensitivity drug History epilepsy , clinically significant cardiac , respiratory , renal , hepatic , gastrointestinal , hematologic psychiatric disease disorder , uncontrolled medical illness History gastric surgery ( except phyloromoyotomy pyloric stenosis infancy ) , vagotomy , bowel resection surgical procedure might interfere gastrointestinal motility , pH absorption Requirement overthecounter prescription medication , vitamins herbal supplement , except contraceptive hormone replacement therapy female , regular basis Use medication , vitamins / herbal supplement except contraceptive hormone replacement therapy female , within 2 week prior study drug administration within 5 halflives , whichever long Receipt drug injection within 30 day 5 halflives , whichever longer , prior study drug administration , except parenteral hormonal contraceptive female Receipt investigational product within 6 week prior study drug administration 5 halflives , whichever longer Recent ( 6month ) history drug alcohol abuse Consumption alcohol within 72 hour prior study drug administration Consumption grapefruit grapefruit product , Seville oranges , starfruit , product contain ingredient , and/or quinine/tonic water 7 day prior study drug administration Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within 6 month study drug administration Positive hepatitis A virus immunoglobulin M , hepatitis B surface antigen hepatitis C virus antibody HIV antibody .
